alert.note: Alert for Burleigh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 8:59PM CDT until May 09 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Burleigh County in south central North Dakota... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 858 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lincoln, or near Bismarck, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Menoken around 915 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mckenzie and Mcdowell Dam Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
